meanings.definition: To awaken or stir up again.
meanings.sent1: The smell of fresh cookies rearouses my appetite.
meanings.sent2: The loud music rearouses memories of my youth.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected rain rearouses the need for an umbrella.
meanings.sent4: Her passionate speech rearouses the spirit of the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The sunrise rearouses the beauty of the landscape.

meanings.sent1: The surprise gift rearouses her excitement for the upcoming trip.
meanings.sent2: The old photograph rearouses fond memories of family gatherings.
meanings.sent3: The funny movie rearouses laughter in the room.
meanings.sent4: His words rearouse the fire of determination within me.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh flowers rearouses a sense of joy in the garden.
